content.detailedDescription: I am sorry. the pictures i sent had an exposure time of 4 seconds, so the lights are clearly the airplane's strobe light at different points as the plane flew by. i am a moron. please forgive me.
content.summary: 3 lights seen in the photograph resembling orion in disguise (update)

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down the 57 fwy sb from san dimas area heading towards orange county. i observed a blue-white glowing disk appear out of nowhere. i noticed it because the object seemed enormous. it was either big or somewhat close. it appeared and maybe hovered for a second before it took off at what seemed to be an impossible speed heading south in a perfectly straight line. it took off so fast that it had a triangular trail following it. only thing i can compare the trail to is what maybe a star trek or star wars ship looks like as it jumps into lightspeed. i was in the military and i've seen supersonic aircraft and this was unlike anything i've ever seen. it was so fast i can't really put words to it. the object seemed to have a glowing blue ring inside what appeared to be a white glowing surface. this is the first time i've ever seen much less reported anything of this nature in my life. the speed of this object is what led me to believe that it wasn't a conventional aircraft. i can't stress enough how fast this thing darted across the entire sky and disappeared. 

about 5-10 minutes later as i connected from the 57 fwy sb to the 22 fwy wb that i saw a much higher object do the same maneuver. the direction was west. this object was too high for me to see if there was color in addition to the white glowing surface. this object to shot across the entire length of the visible sky in virtually no time and disappeared. the reason i noticed this object is because i couldn't take my eyes off the sky because of what i observed the first object do.

these observations were shocking to me. i literally stared at the sky the entire way home afterwards hoping to catch another glimpse of the unbelievable events.
content.summary: Blue-white disk-shape object appeared out of nowhere and took off faster than anything i've ever seen including military fighter jets.

content.detailedDescription:
First seen over gallatin road near military cemetery. i was driving down gallatin away from downtown and saw the object out of the corner of my eye. i slowed the car and watched the object come out of a thunderhead cloud, hover for a few seconds and then turn upside down and go back into the cloud.

the contrast of the white object against the black cloud made it stand out.

i knew it was an oddity as soon as i saw it because of the maneuvers it made and the fact that it entered the storm cloud.

i was very shaken by the sighting and actually pulled off the road and called a friend to tell her exactly what happened. i felt nervous the rest of the night and had a hard time sleeping.

i saw what i believe is the same object about two or three weeks later in roughly the same area in the middle of the day. the sky was completely clear of clouds. i saw the object directly overhead and it had the same features (or lack of features) as described above. it flew overhead at what looked like a relatively normal rate of speed and then rapidly accelerated. it was gone so fast it looked like it disappeared into nothing.

i've had no other sightings since then.
content.summary: White cigar shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: I  was  at  an  outdoor concert  in  1991   with  many  friends   in  may of  that  year.The  show  had  started  and  about   30  mins  into  it  we  noticed  something in  the  sky  coming  from  the  north    east    it  was  low     just  above  the  tree  tops  as  it  got  closer  it  became  bigger  it  must  have  been   a  mile  or  so  long  and  from top   to  bottom  500  ft.We  all  just  starred  at  it  no   one  really  said  anything  we  were  kind  of  shocked  at  how  big  this  thing  was  and  somebody  shouted  out  "ufo"  then  i  realized  what  i  was  looking  at.It  was  maybe  a 1/4  mile  from  us  to  the south  of  us    heading  west  when  we  really  got  a  good  look  at  it.It  was  so  low   i  thought  it  was  going  to crash  and  kill  every  one  in  a   mile   area  but  it  just  flew  right  on  by  very  slow  did  not  move  fast  at  all  made   no  noise.It  looked  ancient   very   very  old   older  than  anything  i"v  ever seen    the  only  straight  lines  were  the  outer  edges   and  it  kind  had  an  arc   to  it,the  structure  of  it  looked     woven  together  like  a  gigantic  jigsaw  puzzle  as  it  passed  by  we  could  see  the  back  of  it  and  there  was  the  power  source  it  looked  like  the  color of  metal  ore  with  a  com  trail   two miles  long we  could  see  the  com  trail  for    20  mins   after  it    flew  out  of  sight  to  the  south  west.Two  years  after  this  i  was  at  work  talking  about  it  and  my  boss  pipes  up  and  says  he  saw  the  same  thing   he  said"it  flew  right above   his  house  in  bonner  springs  k.S.   saying  it  was  more  v  shaped and  there  was  a  smaller  craft  right  behind  it   to  the  right " then  it  occurred  to  me  that  we  were  only  seeing  one  side  of  it  which  being   so  big it   looked  cigar  shaped  but  it  was  actually  v  shaped  he  also  said   there  were    giant  orbs  at  each  corner  as  big  as  houses  all  pulsating  and  changing  colors   with  one  in  the  middle.
content.summary: In may  of  1991   myself  and  many  other people  i  was  with  saw  a  gigantic   craft   at  least  a  mile  long   and  500  ft  wide  from  top  to  bottom,it  came  from the north  east  and  heading south west , very  low , no  noise , slow  .

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving the college library in newburgh, ny and decided to drive home to make dinner.  it was already dark out but not late enough for me to be starving, so i had time to cook!  i was driving down route 9w going north towards marlboro, highland area.  when i reached the firehouse on the right a couple miles up from hwy 84, i noticed some tall circular lights (gold and red) in the sky up ahead.  i thought that's weird, it must be a crane working at night.  the traffic on 9w is always heavy and since it is only a 2 lane north/south lane road, you have to watch what you are doing carefully because people stop to turn left/right and so on.  as i got closer i could not take my eyes of the lights, something was weird about them.  they were high in the air but low to the ground and only seconds after i first noticed them, i realized there was no way it was a crane, it was a plane-the lights gave the impression of a huge plane?  it was moving in the air....Very slowly <15mph? and it was way to low to the ground to be heading for a landing at stewart international airport (which does has a airforce base close by i believe)  i could not keep my eyes off of it, and worried about crashing i pulled over in a small in drivway, not even taking the time to turn completly in....I just put my emergency flashers on and turned off the car, opening the door and standing there.  seeng this huge piece of machine? just floating there not really moving, definatly not a plane now, but i could not make out its exact shape but i could hear it, there was no noise per say, like a car engine would make it was more like the sound of air pushing thru it, it was so strange.  i tried to call out on my phone, but the call was unable to connect because some sort of data connection was preventing me from calling out? very soon after, it started moving again, i wanted to follow it so i jumped in my car and tried to get back on 9w but going the oppusite direction because this thing went south.  it was probably only 100 yards in the sky but it was about 400 yards out from the road.  the traffic was so bad i could no jump out into it to follow the thing but it was moving away sort of slow, so i thought i could catch up but then it must of picked up speed because it was gone just like that and the strange thing is the second it disappeared this car driving south had sparks flying underneath the car!  like his whole engine was falling out...I tagged behind him and honked and flashed him so he pulled over.  he said he new his exhaust pipe must have fallen? i realized i lost whatever it was and stayed in the stewart parking lot and tried to call out on my virgin mobile phone, but was unable to because of some data connection error?  so i turned it off, hoping to reset it...Determined to tell someone?  i drove high in the hills hoping i'd see some sign of this thing but the lights did seem to flash/pulse the way i planes might and since the colors were similar, there was no way to tell.  i saw several planes in the sky.
content.summary: Driving home from work, i saw lights not far off and assumed it was a crane for building.

content.detailedDescription:
on my way to work, traveling south on wadsworth,i live at 14th and wadsworth area, in lakewood. trying to remember exactly where, jus know its where the road starts descending and pikes peak is visible. its around 6:45am coulda been 6:46 or 47. doin my usual while driving and scanning the skies when east of pikes peak a dull off white light appears, not to bright drops down a bit and then proceeds in a westerly direction for one second. in my best guess it traveled 30-50 miles in a second and then lost sight of it. from my view point i could see the whole area. 
  all i saw was a light, too far,too fast. 
  i couldn't tell if it flew over pikes peak or if it was in the area like castle rock area.
content.summary: Off white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was photographing with my nikon 5100 dslr camera for christmas lights night photography.The night on dec 12, 2011 was very cloud and there was not a star visible in the sky. i did not notice anything unusual in the sky because i was focussing on taking pictures of the christmas lights. but when i came home and transferred my pictures from the camera's sd card to my laptop, i saw 3 pictures that displayed the ufo. first picture which displayed the ufo was taken at 8:26:37s pm(shows ufo on upper left). 2nd and 3rd pictures are at 8: 29:27s pm and 8:29:45s (18 seconds apart) which indicate the movement of the ufo from right side to the upper left within the 18 second time duration.

from what i can conclude with the picture is that it seems to be a big big spaceship and you can clearly see that it is resembling the orion stars in disguise. you can also see the shape of the ufo from the pictures when you zoom it. 

i still have the pictures just the way they were taken in my sd card and i have in no way modified any pictures. i am presenting it just the way it is.Attached please find the pictures and let me know if you need more information. i can be reached via email.

thanks,
sameer
content.summary: 3 lights seen in the photograph resembling orion in disguise

content.detailedDescription: My nephew was working in unionville mi, he does construction all over the state of mi, he saw what looked to be 2 moons fused. he then snapped a photo and uploaded it to his facebook while at work. i am his aunt and think it needs to be reported. i am including the photo of what he saw, maybe someone else saw this. he has the original photo on his cell phone.
content.summary: My nephew was working, looked up and saw odd lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the airport to rent a car when i observed an object with three lights hooving just at a distance. at first i did not think anything of it thinking that it may just be a plane but it had no blinking lights and it did not appear that it was on approach. as i got closer to the airport the object seemed to have been in the same exact place as i first saw it just over the horizon facing the city. minutes later as i got to the airport it was still in the same place and when i turned around to take a picture of it the object was no longer there.
content.summary: 3 lights hoovering just north of a shopping plaza and south of the international airport not in any path of any runways and appeared to be low and not moving.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving back home and it seemed as if we could not get back on the right road.  two of us women were in the front seat and one in the back seat.  we left the town we were in around 6:00 pm and from then until 7:11 pm we were driving around it seemed as if in circles or backwards.  we knew we were on the right road and then the other lady driving the car and i realized we had changed direction from where we were.   we traveled and went down different roads.   we stopped 3 times for directions and each time, we could not follow the directions.   the last time we were given directions to get back on our road, they said it would take us 12 miles to get there.  we were given several left and right turns to take.  we were suppose to turn to the left when we left the convenience store and as soon as we turned left it seemed a matter of minutes we were right back on the right road they we had started on 1 hr and 11 minutes earlier.   we were relieved that we were on our way home.   it is about 1 1/2 to 2 hours to where we live.   after riding for a few minutes the driver asked the passenger in the back if she was ok.  it took her a few minutes to answer.  finally, she said "oh, i was just looking at the ufo and it separated.  it was so pretty."  neither one of us in the front said anything and just kept going.  about 20 minutes later i looked over to my right, i was on the passenger side in the front, and there it was.  just hovering to my right and then it was over the car and could see the shape clearly with the green lights and seemed like landing legs or tripods.  i asked the other lady if that was a plane, but knew it wasn't.   all we could do was just look in awe.  it seemed as if we could not move but just look.  the lady in the back heard us talking and moved forward and saw the object also.   she is usually very vocal but was almost serene.   slowly the object moved over the trees to the left and now, i think about it, it was giving off light as it ascended towards the sky and i could see it so clearly when it turned back towards the road and thought it was coming back.  seemed like a flash it was down the road in front of us again and then the lady in the back and i saw it go back over to the right of us and then it just hovered.  we could see the lights thru the trees and that is the last we saw of it.   after so long we were discussing it and trying to figure out all the events of the night.   then we realized that we had heard no sound, not even the sounds of the car.  how did this object keep level with us hovering and we were probably traveling 45 to 55 mph.   it was like we were in a trance.  now, i think why didn't i take a picture, but it was like we were dazed.   the longer it goes on i have certain things that come to my mind.   i know will never have an answer, but would like to know why this object approached us and why no sounds.  we didn't even pass any other vehicles on the road during this time.   i know there is more to write but at the moment this is as clear as i can put down.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was triangle shaped with green lights on bottom.  several lights, but could  not count.  also seemed to have landing legs or tripods on bottom..

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home at night in the dark on my road which is very rural in the shenandoah mountains. while driving home i noticed two very bright lights low in the air. one off to the right of me and one off to the left. i guess what made me notice them was that they moved very little if at all, they seemed very large and low in the sky. they seemed like stars that were literally right there close and low in the sky. i assumed maybe they were helicopters or a small aircraft. but that idea slowly disappeared after i noticed these objects tend to hover and that they didn't seem to make noise. the one to the left seemed to move more and farther distances. the one on the right seemed to hover more. the road is very rural and winds through the valley between two mountain ranges. at times i would go around the bend and my view would be obscured, then i would drive further and the hovering light would be right in front of me or close by off to the right. at one point i mentioned it to my 15 year old daughter who was in the car with me and she said she had noticed it up in the sky even before we had turned on our road. both of us wondered what it was because it didn't appear to move, just hovered. when we got to our driveway, i pulled in and shut everything off and rolled the windows down because i wanted to hear if there was an engine noise or a propeller noise from a helicopter or a small plane. there was nothing but silence. it was very close. maybe the distance of 2 to 3 football fields away. if it was making a noise we definitely would have heard it. it was completely silent. then i drove down my driveway which winds through the woods and lost sight of it for a period of time. when i entered the house i went directly to my bedroom and got my binoculars, went outside on the porch and it appeared that the unidentified object was hovering directly in front of me over the field in the valley behind my house. i would say no more than 3 football fields away. i looked through the binoculars and saw a very large, bright light. if it wasn't dark i feel like i would have been able to see the actual object better but i really could only see a very bright light. i texted my boyfriend who was in a neighboring town on the other side of the massanutten mountain. he called and said he had been watching what appeared to be a hovering light above the mountain range. we got off the phone and i tried to take a photo which did not work out since it was so dark and i don't have a good enough camera. ten  minutes later he called back again, this time from his friends house and his friend saw it and said he thought i should report it to the local sheriffs office. i called and they sent someone out to see if they could find it. by that time it had travelled in a straight path, slowly and disappeared out of my view. the sheriff's dispatch called me back and said that they were unable to locate the lights and that they had called the faa and there were no aircraft known to be in this area at that time. my feelings started out as simple curiosity and then developed into a bit of fear. eventually, after it slowly disappeared i was experiencing bouts of nervous laughter. meanwhile my fifteen year old was very nervous and upset and scared. she wanted to get back in the car and leave the house.
content.summary: Siting started on the drive home from work and continued at home.

content.detailedDescription: Observed a strange "beam shaped" light, directed downward at about 35 to 40 degrees. once we had focused our attention on the object it turned instantly ,the light turned off, and it headed straight towards us. at that point you could see a huge,gray-ish object materializing.When fully materialized we could see that it was about the size of four [4] shopping malls in size,that is to include the parking lots. it passed slowly over head,about 500 to 700 ft. above the deck. lights could be seen,through what must have been windows,and three or four levels to the craft were clearly visable. we were absolutely mesmerized,and could not take our eyes off this thing until it was completely out of sight. which took about 15 to 20 minutes. we were standing beside mercer rd.In decatur,ga. during the twilight hour in late august of 1967 when this occured. i remember the three of us knowing that this thing somehow knew that we had observed it,that's when it abrutly turned,the light went out and it began to materialize. afterwards we told our parents. the parents of my two "friends" who also witnessed the object,thought we were  "crazy,lying,or smoking pot." to the contrary my mother decided to call the sheriffs department,who informed her of other reports of a similar nature. i also remember a small newspaper article,on the back page of course,reporting  the incident a few days there after. reporting the sighting to our parents taught me that most people will think you're completly over the edge if you mention ufo's. after all, this took place in 1967. in recent years,however given the number of tv shows,news reports,etc...I feel more comfortable coming foward with this story. in the past i was very carefull about who i talked with on the subject of ufo's. although i've remained absolutely fascinatied with the subject.In closing i'd like to say they're many verses in the bible that speak of things like,ufo's,other beings in the universe etc... that i would be happy to share ,if anyone is interested i.E... has anyone considered the star of bethlehem that led the magi to the nativity.Stars don't move,but ufo's do,at least the one i saw did.
content.summary: Observed beam light which then

content.detailedDescription: I was vacationing with friends in seaside, oregon at a house on the ocean from may 5th-10th.  on the last night there -- may 9th -- i first noticed a strange slanted beam of light after dusk -- 7:11 pm to be exact.  the light was focused, not diffuse, and lasted about five minutes. i took 13 photos of the beam from it's brightest to fading completely over the five minutes.  that same night, at 9:48 pm, i noticed in the same vicinity a bright white glowing light, which appeared brighter that a fishing boat and did not glide across the horizon as fishing boats do.  the light appeared stationary.  i slid back the window, stuck my camera out in the dark and just started shooting one photo after another. i shot nine photos in two minutes and what appeared on camera is not what i saw.  while all i ever saw was a bright white glowing egg shaped light, the photos each reveal something entirely different.  the first photo shows a horizontal cylinder of glowing white light with a while line of light hovering above.  at the top of the photo appears a brownish object with two red lights.  i did not see that.  the second photo is a long squiggly line of glowing white light.  two other photos have similar squiggly glowing white lights in different formations.  the fifth photo is the most interesting to me.  when blown up there appears to be a triangular patterned craft hovering over a glowing triangular light below, with a tube of black appearing to connect the two.  the brownish object with red lights is hovering above.  the other photos show the simple glowing oval shaped light.  believing i took photos of nothing but a speck of white light on the horizon, i didn't really pay attention until a few hours later when i reviewed the photos i took that day.  that's when i realized what i witnessed.  my friends -- not serious believers in ufos -- were convinced when the saw the photos, several of which are very similar to those in the book "examining the earthlight theory:  the yakima ufo microcosm." my reactions were total excitement and regret that i did not look at the photos i took sooner.  i would have taken many more.
content.summary: I saw a bright light and took photos of what appeared to be a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was video taping a white cigar shaped craft flying in a straight line. i was standing in my back yard after getting the kids off the bus around 4:30 eastern time. when i went to review the footage i took, i noticed a few seconds into the video a dark grey disc shaped craft flies through the frame at a great speed! i was very excited to have gotten more than one craft on film at the same time. the white cigar shaped craft i see almost every day fly over my house.( only on a clear day ) these craft do not give off any vapor trails like the rest of the plains that fly in the area. it's cold this time of year and every plane low or high in the air gives of some sort of trail. i've taken several photos of these craft and can not see any wings or tail rutter. at a quick glance in the sky, they do look like plains. my personal opinion on these ones is that there some sort of military drone or unmanned vehicle. the other grey disc craft would be a first for this area in a long time for me!
content.summary: Video taping 1 cigar shaped craft, when another grey disc flys through the frame

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard smoking a cigarette last night (approx. 11:00, 12/12/11). i remembered that there is going to be a pretty good meteor shower on 12/14 so i looked up to see if there was anything i could see. as i was watching the sky, i did actually see about 4 shooting stars.

i was looking almost straight up when something different from what i had seen of the shooting stars showed up.

i didn't know what it could possibly be. we have planes flying over our home all time because we live near an airport so i have seen my fair share of lights in the sky. this object was totally unfamiliar to me.

it was a pentagon shape made up of 6 orb-like dull green (swamp green) spheres. i couldn't see the actual object (if there was one); only the spheres that made up the shape. the spheres were located at each point of the pentagon and one in the middle of the object. the reason i say "orb-like" is because they didn't emit any light as i would expect them to. when it came into view, it was as if it were coming out of a cloak. i could see the object for about 2 seconds (flying straight) before it vanished the same way it came into view (cloaked). if you were in the dark with a flashlight and something passed by the beam of light, that's what it looked like except a light shining on this object would have made it more visible in my opinion.

it took a second for me to realize i could have just witnessed a ufo. i contemplated in my mind what it could possibly have been to no avail. i stayed outside for a little longer to see if it came back or more could be visible but there was nothing else. there was not much time to analyze more detail of what i had just seen as it was here and gone so fast (about the speed of a shooting star).

i finished my cigarette and went inside but didn't tell my wife about it immediately. i cleaned up the living room a little bit, grabbed a sheet of paper and a pen. i drew out the shape of the pentagram and showed it to my wife. i said, "i just saw this in the sky." she asked if it had any lights on it and i said no then gave her the description from above.

i went outside with my camera to try to take some long exposure shots of the sky to see if i could catch anything else but didn't see anything more.

i wanted to make sure i remembered what i saw, so explaining it to my wife was my backup. this morning, i decided to make an animated gif image of what i had seen. i tried to make it as accurate as possible so i used a background image of last nights sky.
content.summary: Looking for shooting stars and saw a dull green pentagon shaped object made up of 6 orb-like spheres.

content.detailedDescription:
In the fall of 1972, indianapolis, indiana around 7pm our family was driving to meet friends, when we saw a lot of people out on their sidewalks looking up at the sky.
we pulled over and i got out and witnessed what looked like a huge bright glowing star but it was not a star it was too large.
we continued on to our friends house and there were people still out watching this object in the sky. 
maybe an hour later we watched as 6 glowing objects came out of the large object lined up 3 on each side. they all came out at the same time. then they formed a v shape formation and dispersed to where i do not know.
we watched the large object remain stationary for another couple of hours until the 6 object came back and lined up the same way as they came out and all go in the large object all at once and then disappear into a cloud that was not there earlier. we were all agasp and excited and called the then popular radio station wife. the lines were jammed with other callers and we never got through.

the next day the news reported the ufo's as a weather balloon.
content.summary: Bright light in sky resembling a star but was not and 6 objects came out

content.detailedDescription: I was going to my car which was parked in my driveway to grab some items out of it, and when i opened the door i could instantly smell something which i could only relate to the smell of sulphur outside, and while making my way to my vehicle i noticed a object hovering under the clouds about half a mile away, as i noticed something shining in the corner of my eye which was odd as it was cloudy outside. this object was grey but very bright to the point where it appeared to be reflective. there was a faint yellow glow around the perimeter of the object. as far as i could tell i'd have to say it was between 35 and 55 feet in diameter. i could not tell how thick it was as i could not see the top of the object as it was in the clouds, but the part of the object that was visible appeared to be around 7 or 8 feet thick. i wasn't sure what to make of the object as i had never seen anything like that in my life, and i felt that i was indeed seeing something that could have very easily been from another world, but as i was unable to make out exactly how thick/tall this object was there was no way of knowing for sure. after standing outside and observing it for just over a minute and a half i went inside to grab my digital camera and when i went back outside the object had vanished much to my disappointment. i did not in any way feel scared or threatened by this object and i only wish it would have been a clear day so i would have had a better overall look of this object. this was my first ufo sighting.
content.summary: Grey disc shaped ufo with yellow glow

content.detailedDescription:
When i was a child i suffered from extreme night terrors. i thought there was something taking me in the night. i would awake to blinding light and then i'd wake a second time, as if i were having a dream inside a dream. these terrors kept on for most of my childhood. it wouldn't happen every night, but once or twice a month. 
my family moved north when i was 8, after years of brutal nightmares the new environment seemed to calm my mind. this didn't last long though. more frequently i felt as i i were being taken by the white lights. i pleaded with my parents to believe me but they didn't. they had no answers either.
one of the nights i woke before the white lights. i was laying in my bunk bed, my brother on bottom and i m top. i  was looking at the glow in the dak stars i had on my ceiling when, in an instant i was blinded by this white light. i felt fear come over me and i couldn't scream for help. i helplessly watched my door creek open. there it was. the night person i was dreamin about. it didn't look at me, it looked around for a second and walked toward the bunk beds. i remember trying to scream but i couldn't. i couldn't breathe or move. it walked up besides he bunk beds, inspecting my brother. i tried to scream and got nothing. it looked up at me with snap of its head. almost like it was surprised i was looking at it. as if i startled it. it stretched it's hand out to my face as if to grab me. i fought my fear and managed to ball up a fist and try to hit it. i did, but barely. i tapped it, just barely touching it. it recoiled its hand and sidestepped away, out the door. in the morning i told my family. they laughed and said i have new friends. i kept this to myself until now. my family can back up my story. only 3 people outside my family know this.  i'll take a lie detector any day.
content.summary: Eye contact with alien, attempted abduction, physical contact

content.detailedDescription: This morning 12/12/11 at 7:30 a.M. i was driving north on waverly road.  the moon was still bright and visible and under it was an object that seemed to be just hanging there.  the object was all lit up; one bright light.  airplanes and jets are not typically all lit up.  there was no contrail.  as i continued north, the object moved quickly upward northward and from my perspective was above the moon by that time.  it still did not look like an airplane or jet.  i lost sight of it after almost hitting another car.  when i arrived home i looked up and saw a jet traveling south with a visible contrail and much higher up in the sky that this object that i saw was.
content.summary: Light under moon

content.detailedDescription: My friend greg and i were out on my deck one day when we noticed a light moving from left to right above the tree line. about 20 minutes later we both witnessed 2 black helicopters appear and begin circling the object.After a few minutes of this the mysterious light simply vanished.
content.summary: 2 black helicopters were circling object  for a good 35 minutes

content.detailedDescription: On 12/12/11 at 7:30 am i was driving north on waverly road in lansing.  i looked over at the moon which was still fully visible in the western sky.  it looked like there was a craft hanging under the moon.  i did believe it to be an airplane, but what was strange was that the craft was fully lit up.   airplanes aren't typically lit in entirety.  as i continued to watch it, it began moving and was, perception wise, at a level that was higher than the moon.  i noticed a flashing light, but again the entire craft was very bright and i was having getting a good look at it and was also was driving.  i continued to watch for it, but i lost visibility of it.  there was no contrail, and it was much lower than a jet would have been traveling.  when i arrived home, i got out of my car and noticed a jet in the sky that was traveling south and it clearly had a contrail.  the jet was much higher than the object i saw and being a jet, it was barely visible in front of the contrail.
content.summary: Hanging under moon

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking, looked due east and see same object as reported about three weeks ago,i noticed the flashing lights as before,it is just sitting there pulsating different color lights,i reported this same object 3-4 weeks ago same location,just walked back outside 9:44pm object still there,and no there are no camp mcall actions that i know of,no helicopter in sight or sound of any flying machine,beleive the airport if you want but i know what i see for the second time.
content.summary: Flashing red,blue orange,lights white glow dominant

content.detailedDescription: I was told of this event by my parents. as they were driving home they noticed what they believed to be a shooting star or even a possible meteorite falling from the sky. only they told me they had never seen one so bright, and there was apparently no trail, as most meteorites leave in their wake. they usually look to the night sky, having seen many unidentified flying objects of various shapes and sizes in their lifetime. the object shot across the sky in an arch, and then straight towards the earth, no longer visible. the color was a very bright starlike white and orange mix. to me it sounded very much like an incident witnessed by my entire family in january of 2010. we watched four brilliant orange objects one behind the other slowly rising into the sky, glowing with a great inteansity before rising so high they were no longer visible.
content.summary: Starlike object streaks in arch towards earth.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were walking back from hunting to my parents home.We were about a half mile from home through a wooded area and this beam of light shined down on us.It made no noise.You could see kind of an outline around the light you could see the disc shape,my friend and i took a shot at it with shot guns.You could hear the buck shot hit the thing,it didn't move right away but when it did it was gone in a blink of your eye.The light was bright kind of yellowish and it was like a beam.That was the first time i had ever seen anything like that,it was sept.1960 i was 13 yrs.Old and i have had 5 more sightings sense then.
content.summary: Hovered over head shined light on us then left.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out a kitchen window last evening when i noticed a strange light in the sky-off in the distance, that was bright white; i thought it might be an approaching plane, but it was just hovering.  it then began to flash randomly, red, red, white,. white, red, white, etc.  it went just red for a while.  it moved abruptly, hovered, stopped, then changed direction.  it went on for about 15 minutes.  i thiought this can't be a plane, it is not moving like a helicopter.  it then went over the tree line, but it was like it was floating up and down gently.  it was off in the distance; it was hard to tell how far.  it was really strange.  i wasn't outside so i couldn't tell if it was making a noise or not, but planes flying by made noise that i could hear. this was not making audible sounds that i could tell.  it flew in from the southwest, turned, and began heading in a northwesterly direction.  then it disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Randomly fluctuating red and white lights

content.detailedDescription: On  december 12, 2011 around 6:30pm (est) i pulled up to my house (location moved to fi box) cms 12/13/11 09:19 cst flg, and as i was parking, i noticed lights falling from the sky, they fell fast, so im not sure what it was. they fell behind a neighbors house, i did not go investigate where they landed or if they vanished, however i did experience the event before but never reported it. about a month ago on november 8th around 11:40pm or so i was standing in line for the newly released call of duty modern warfare 3, and it was roughly about 20 minutes until the release, when i looked across the highway (649 clairton blvd  pleasant hills, pa 15122) right above the car dealership and saw several lights falling from the sky, and then vanished. i didnt know if i had saw what i thought i was seeing, but a girl in front of me saw the same thing as well. at that point i know i wasn't crazy. we had no idea what it was, or why the event occurred, im sure the has to be an explanation, possibly and probably something natural. there was nothing else visible in the sky on either night, no aircraft of any sort.
content.summary: Falling lights from the sky

content.detailedDescription: Ever since i witnessed something strange in the sky on november 30th, i have been looking in that area to see if it would come back and to my shocking disbelief, it did.  on december 10th, a quick glance into the eastern sky and i knew that 'it' was back.  i immediately grabbed my digital camera and took video and photo's.  this time i used a trash dumpster to be sure that my camera was absolutely steady.  i observed it for 4 hours until i was just too tired to stay up anymore.  the object moves at incredible speeds, has an erratic path, yet stays in the same vicinity.  from the ground it can be easily mistaken for a star but if you look at it for a few seconds, you can see it moving with no apparent directional pattern, just extremely fast.The pictures that i am attatching to this report have been cropped for easier viewing, no other editing and i do have all the originals.  the video is absolutely raw footage and doesnt really do justice to what i am trying to describe but it is the shortest video i have thus far so that is why i am attatching it.  at this point i now have a collection of hundreds of pictures and several video's from two sightings, in the same location, from what appears to be the same unidentified object.
content.summary: Appears star-like from the ground, moving erratic pattern, stays in one vicinity, 2nd sighting, same area, 2 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: Saturday november 5th i left my mothers house around 9:30 pm going back to my fathers home where i live for dinner. it takes about ten minutes to get to the top of the (address moved to fi box) cms 12/13/11 09:27 cst flg. overpass from my moms. i was heading east on boon rd and off to my left past the entrance ramp behind the clam river on the ground was what i thought at first was a fire truck because of its size, and color of the lights. i slowed down to 25 put my truck in third by the time i made the bottom, and gazed into the woods at what it could be. i passed what i call the bridge to nowhere" a newly installed bridge over the clam river off boon everyone who misses their exit turns around there. there is a thin tree line the rest is clearcut. the car behind me slowed down too at the top of the overpass with an open left lane too pass me. they saw it too. i pulled around in the car pool parking lot they continued on. i went back, and parked at the bridge to nowhere before the us 131 north exit. it was blocked off by cement blockers and chain. it was right then i knew it wasnt a vehicle unless it drove in through the back on dirt country roads. this thing was too big for that. i got out of the truck it was sleet and rain. all i had on was one coat, and a crappy pair of converse. i went out anyway. i just kept thinking in my head. this isnt how its supposed to happen. like there is some way this should have happened... i walked as far as to the edge of the tree line i wanted cover. when i looked back i couldnt see the road it was too dark and sleeting too hard. all i could see were the lights. these lights were not caused by blinking bulbs. i dont know what caused the lights, but they flickered like fire, or like magic. red, yellow, white. only on the edges the rest looked black metal it was dark it was a disk i couldnt tell how thick or tall it was, but it was big as to compare it to the size of a fire truck or larger. i pulled my hood down after about a minute of watching the lights to see if i could hear anything other than the sleet hitting my hood. the lights made no noise, but i felt a low humming. like inside my in my chest. i could hear the sticks on the ground around me cracking. like something was moving around. by now my heart is beating out of my chest i should mention i have a heart condition so i did think i may die of awe or fright. i remember seeing three shadows in front of the light more cracking. then the lights turned off. it was like it was gone. i could see nothing i turned and ran as fast as i could. i slipped right when i took off and hurt my wrist, and my pinky finger. i made it too the truck, and locked the doors. i stared into the woods with rain on my windshield for about five minutes before i drove home. i went inside to tell my dad what had happened, and to go back with me, but he was sleeping. his girlfriend was drunk on the couch him and her got into a fight. so i didnt disturb him. i went back outside to call my girlfriend i told her i saw some lights, and i want to go back in the morning and check it out. i didnt mention stopping just mentioned it, and she continued to ignore it and chew me out for not having a job instead. two days later im telling my roommates about it in full detail, and they ask me what time did you call your girlfriend. so i looked in my phone it was 12:46 pm i called her moments after i got home. my sighting was three miles down the road from my bedroom. it didnt take two hours to see this. i didnt understand why my father was in bed at what i thought was early ten o clock ten thirty. i went back in the morning, and didnt see any sign of cars or trucks back there. no burns or indents. i think it wasnt touching the ground.  i didnt think it would be like this. what i saw that night was beautiful, and terrifying. i still dont understand. what dont i remember. it took a lot to write this down. it kind of makes it feel concrete, but in the end it feels good just to say it. i dont know where i want this to go. i have no pictures i have no video only my word. what i saw happened. this is my own backyard for the most part. ive had sightings before, but not like this. this one was here on the ground. it seems to make a bigger impact. each sighting seems to leave me with more questions than answers i wish i had a support group, or someone i could talk to about this. everyone thinks youre just crazy when you talk about this. well im not crazy yet. i know what saw im just sharing now. which is a lot harder than listening.
content.summary: Saw lights in woods stopped to investigate 2 hours missing time.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting by the window in my living room when a light caught my eye then looked out the window, i assumed it was a plane or star at first..Until i ran outside to see more clearly  and realized it was flickering multi colored lights...I was about a mile away and i could only see the light through the trees but i could clearly see it was not an airplane nor helicopter..No noise i could hear coming from any direction. my husband and i both saw the object illuminating the multi colored light just hovering in the same spot..It proceeded to dim to nothing then lost site of the light..I waited a few seconds to see if it would pop up anywhere else,then my husband saw it pop up again and i saw it with my own eyes again in the same spot it was previously in before,but it only stayed lit for about another 30-45secs then it disappeared for good...It actually was the coolest thing i ever seen.
content.summary: Saw flashing colored lights brighter than a star it flickered about 5mins then dimmed to nothing then gone from sight just dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving down 19 mile road in marshall, mi going south and i saw a bright light fly across the sky. i did not say anything because i always make comment about ufo's and my girlfriend tells me to stop because i scare her, but this time she spoke up and said, "wow i just felt like you for a second. i could've sworn i just saw something fly across the sky." i think she noticed me looking into the sky as well and i responded to her in less than a second explaining what i had seen as well. a bright white light just shot faster than my eyes could follow across the sky and seemingly disappeared into the night sky. when the light flew across the sky we were seeing it through a little bit of branches in the trees, but it was clearly in the sky and not just a reflection off the trees.
content.summary: U.F.O. in the country
